items.value: %113% has reported what appears to be an incomplete ritual circle within one of the cemetery mausoleums. It appears to be a part of an ancient unfinished curse.  We can instruct %113% to complete the circle and figure out how to finish the ritual.

%113% tried a couple of chants to complete the curse. After invoking the last one, a violent thunder strike sounded from the distance. It seems that the curse was successfully cast. [Character Name] has now been inflicted with [Curse Name].
%113% tried a couple of chants to complete the curse but nothing seemed to work. He gave up after hundreds of attempts.

%113% tried a couple of chants to complete the curse. After invoking the lat one, an eerie silence covered the entire mausoleum. It seems that the curse was successfully cast but instead of inflicting [Character Name], it inflicted %113% with the curse. He now has [Curse Name].
%113% extracted all remaining mana from the unfinished ritual.
%113% cleared out the ritual circle and moved on.
%113% attempt to curse [Character Name] backfired! [Demon Name] gains [Curse Name].
%113% attempt to curse [Character Name] backfired! [Demon Name] gains [Curse Name].
%113% obtained some Mana from an unfinished ritual.
%113% obtained some Mana from an unfinished ritual.
